attributes.action: Commission a full public inquiry into the Rape and Grooming Gang atrocities.
attributes.additional_details: To ensure we understand the factors that allowed and facilitated these events, ensure that the lessons are learned and the victims are heard and achieve closure. To identify culpability where appropriate and recommend actions to ensure these events never recur.
attributes.background: Commission an independent public inquiry into the grooming gang scandal to identify the drivers of these atrocities including the societal and cultural factors that supported and facilitated these events.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
